intro: Indexes are specific collections of stocks that you can purchase all at once.

list: S&P 500 - the 500 best stocks - an indicator of how the market is doing
DOW Industrial Average - set of 30 stocks that represents the average of the market
NASDAQ 100 - the stocks of the 100 top tech companies
There's an Standard & Poor's index for each market cap size
ETF (Exchange Traded Funds) - trade the entire index at a time (Ex. S&P 500)
Very similar to index funds (passive mutual funds)
